statements: UPDATE recipes SET instructions='Mix everything together' WHERE recipe_id=1;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients='1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 cup milk' WHERE recipe_name='Pancakes';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = '1 cup flour, 1 egg, 1 cup milk' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', instructions = '1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry bacon and eggs. 3. Mix together.' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE Recipes SET cook_time = 60 WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE CookingLogs SET notes = 'Added extra salt' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE Recipes SET ingredients = 'Salt, Pepper, Olive Oil' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE CookingLogs SET date = '2022-10-15', start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '12:00:00', notes = 'Delicious meal prepared' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name='Spaghetti Aglio e Olio', ingredients='Spaghetti, garlic, olive oil', instructions='Cook spaghetti, sauté garlic in olive oil, toss with spaghetti' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE cooking_times SET cook_time_minutes=30, recipe_id=1 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = 'Salt, Pepper, Garlic' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_times SET cook_time_minutes = 45 WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE Recipe SET ingredients='Salt, Pepper, Olive Oil' WHERE recipe_id=1;
UPDATE Ingredient SET quantity=2.5, unit='tbsp' WHERE ingredient_id=2;
UPDATE Recipe SET instructions = 'Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE Ingredient SET quantity = 2.5, unit = 'cups' WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET cooking_time = 45 WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET type = 'Spice' WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET cooking_time = 45 WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
